name: Exploration-Build/Craft Your Dream Things Survival
description:
# If you fail to launch the app, please remove the app and install it again.
# Many new online worlds will be added, please keep your eyes on us!

Join online multiplayer world with thousands of random players or friends in Multiplayer mode or create your own creative/adventure/survival game on the infinite randomly generated maps, and share with your friends! This is free game and is inspired by Minecraft, Survival craft and the like.
Create your own cool character for multiplayer games, share your character to your friends.
Awesome building, cute animals, zombies and lots of monsters etc. its great fun to find different resources, craft new items and build anything you can image! keep away from dangerous things and find food or hunt down eatable mobs to overcome your hunger!

World Interaction
Double tap:
Double tap: place node
Tap and hold long: dig the node
Tap and hold short(1 second): use item, like open chest etc
Select blocks: double-click inside the ui to select all or one
Craft Guild
Place a craft book, 'Tap and hold short' to open it

Send us email if you have any questions or suggestions about this app. This app is base on voxelands, google voxeland or check http://bit.ly/1QYPyWG to know more about this app.
Lots of amazing things will be added soon so keep your eyes on us and rate us!
